content.value:
Free product idea: The Great Twitter Escape

* twitter app
* scans people you follow for personal website URLs
* checks if there's an RSS feed for that URL
* provides a pick-and-choose UI of all feeds
* generates an OPML file to import in your reader
content.html: Free product idea: The Great Twitter Escape * twitter app * scans people you follow for personal website URLs * checks if there's an RSS feed for that URL * provides a pick-and-choose UI of all feeds * generates an OPML file to import in your reader
